lines.en: A lion was sleeping under a tree.
A small mouse ran across his paw.
lines.ko: 작은 쥐가 그의 발 위를 달렸어요.

lines.en: The lion woke up and caught the mouse.
The mouse begged, 'Please let me go.'
The lion laughed but set the mouse free.
Days later, hunters caught the lion.
They tied him with strong ropes.
The little mouse heard the lion’s roar.
The mouse ran to help the lion.
It bit the ropes with sharp teeth.
Soon the lion was free again.
He said, 'Even small friends can be great help.'
lines.ko: 그가 말했어요. '작은 친구도 큰 도움이 될 수 있다.'
